Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Morgan
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine, due to street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Pulaski, 71st, Kedzie, and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Pulaski, 71st, Kedzie, and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.
